title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.14 - Departing inmates to precede employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.14 - Departing inmates to precede employee

State Regulations

No inmate or group of inmates which is accompanied by an
employee of the institution or of the department, or by any other civilian, shall be permitted to pass through the exit gate unless the inmate or inmates
walk in front of the official or employee, thereby indicating that such
civilians or employees are not being held as hostages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
